data.body: Use the graph of the function, $f(x)$, estimate the value of  $f'(a)$  for the given values of $a$
Answer the following questions about the function $W(z) = 4z^{2} - 9z$
options: Is the function increasing or decreasing at $z=-1$
Is the function increasing or decreasing at $z=2$
Does the function ever stop changing? If yes, at what value(s) of $z$ does the function stop changing?

data.body: What is the equation of the tangent line to $f(x) = 3 - 14x$ at $x = 8$
options: Is the function increasing or decreasing at $z=-1$
Is the function increasing or decreasing at $z=2$
Does the function ever stop changing? If yes, at what value(s) of $z$ does the function stop changing?

data.body: Suppose that the volume of water in a tank for $0 ≤ t ≤ 6$ is given by $Q(t) = 10 + 5t - t^{2}$
options: Is the volume of water increasing or decreasing at $t=2$
Is the volume of water increasing or decreasing at $t=6$
Does the volume of water ever stop changing? If yes, at what times(s) does the volume stop changing?
